mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MasterInfo ( MCode, Phone, Password, Name, QRCode, Num, AdultNum, ChildNum, JoinDate, point, AgreeDate, FranchiseeNum, FranchiseeCode, EntFlag, TermsFlag ) VALUES ( #{MCode}, #{Phone}, #{Password}, #{Name}, #{QRCode}, #{Num}, #{AdultNum}, #{ChildNum}, Convert(CHAR(8), Getdate(), 112), #{Point}, Convert(varchar(10),Getdate(),112), '8888888', '8888888', '0', '1' )

INSERT INTO MemberInfo ( Name, MCode, EntFlag, MFlag, JoinDate, QRCode, Adult, Phone, Password, FranchiseeNum, FranchiseeCode ) VALUES ( #{Name}, #{MCode}, '0', #{MFlag}, Convert(CHAR(8), Getdate(), 112), #{QRCode}, #{Adult}, #{Phone}, #{Password}, '8888888', '8888888' )
mapper.select: SELECT A.MCode, A.Name, A.Num, A.Status, A.ID, A.Password, A.LastVisit, A.Point, replace( convert( VARCHAR, convert( MONEY, A.Point ), 1 ), '.00', '' ) cPoint, A.DisNum, A.QRCode, A.Phone, A.Birth, A.Adult, A.AdultNum, A.ChildNum, A.JoinDate, A.Address, A.EntFlag, A.EntTime, A.ExtTime, A.EntNumber, A.Memo, A.Picture1, A.Picture2, A.Picture3, A.Picture4, A.Picture5, A.Withdraw, A.WithdrawDate, A.WithdrawMemo, A.FranchiseeNum, A.FranchiseeCode, A.EntFranchiseeCode, A.Coupon1, A.Coupon2, A.Coupon3, A.SpecialMan, A.AgreeFlag, A.TermsFlag, A.AgreeDate, A.Photo, CASE WHEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = A.FranchiseeNum) != NULL THEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = A.FranchiseeNum) WHEN A.FranchiseeNum = '8888888' THEN '모바일' ELSE '슈퍼윙즈키즈카페' END AS fName, CASE WHEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = A.EntFranchiseeCode) != NULL THEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = A.EntFranchiseeCode) ELSE '없음' END AS lFname, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT InDate) FROM VisitInfo WHERE MCode = #{mcode}) vistCount FROM MasterInfo A WHERE A.PHONE = #{cellPhone} AND A.MCODE = #{mcode}

SELECT TOP 10 InDate, CONVERT (DATE, InDate) cIndate, FranchiseeNum, CASE WHEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = VisitInfo.FranchiseeNum) != NULL THEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = VisitInfo.FranchiseeNum) ELSE '슈퍼윙즈키즈카페' END AS fName, replace( convert( VARCHAR, convert( MONEY, Price ), 1 ), '.00', '' ) cPrice, Price FROM VisitInfo WHERE MCode = #{mcode} ORDER BY InDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY InDate) rnum, InDate, CONVERT (DATE, InDate) cIndate, CASE WHEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = VisitInfo.FranchiseeNum) != NULL THEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = VisitInfo.FranchiseeNum) ELSE '슈퍼윙즈키즈카페' END AS fName FROM VisitInfo WHERE MCode = #{mcode} ORDER BY InDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PointHis ( DateTime, Device, MCode, FranchiseeNum, addminus, Point, Satff, comment ) VALUES ( GETDATE(), #{device}, #{MCode}, '8888888', #{addMinus}, #{point}, #{satff}, #{comment} )
mapper.select: SELECT indate, CONVERT (DATE, left(indate,8)) cIndate, goodsname, replace( convert( VARCHAR, convert( MONEY, replace(price,'-','') ), 1 ), '.00', '' ) cPrice, replace(price,'-','') price, franchiseeNum, CASE WHEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = goodssaleinfo.FranchiseeNum) != NULL THEN (SELECT FaseName FROM FranchiseeInfo WHERE FranchiseeNum = goodssaleinfo.FranchiseeNum) WHEN goodssaleinfo.FranchiseeNum = '8888888' THEN '모바일' ELSE '슈퍼윙즈키즈카페' END AS fName FROM goodssaleinfo WHERE MCode = #{MCode} AND GoodsName LIKE'%Point사용%'
